title: Senior Android App Developer
jobDescription:
• As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining Android applications.
  • You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to create high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications that meet the needs of our users and clients. Your role will involve coding, debugging, and optimizing Android apps while staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Design and develop native Android applications from scratch or enhance existing ones to deliver outstanding user experiences.
  • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code, and troubleshoot and resolve bugs to ensure the apps stability and reliability.
  • Work closely with UX/UI designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that align with design guidelines.
  • Integrate with web services, APIs, and third-party libraries to fetch and send data securely.
  • Optimize the apps performance, responsiveness, and resource utilization to ensure smooth user interactions and minimal battery consumption.
  • Use version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage code changes and collaborate effectively with team members.
  • Write unit tests, conduct manual testing, and collaborate with quality assurance teams to ensure the application functions correctly across various devices and Android versions.
  • Implement security best practices, including data encryption, authentication, and authorization, to protect user data and maintain compliance with privacy regulations.
  • Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation for code, APIs, and project-related information to facilitate knowledge sharing and future development.
  • Stay updated with the latest Android development trends, tools, and technologies, and share your knowledge with the team.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, backend developers, and quality assurance engineers, to deliver high-quality products on time.
Qualifications:
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • Proven experience as an Android Developer with a portfolio of completed Android apps.
  • Strong knowledge of Java or Kotlin programming languages.
  • Proficiency in Android Studio and related development tools.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services integration.
  • Experience with version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Understanding of design principles, UI/UX guidelines, and Material Design.
  • Knowledge of mobile app architecture patterns (e.g., MVVM, MVP).
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Ability to work independently and in a team, as well as excellent communication skills.
  • A passion for staying updated with the latest trends in mobile app development.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience with cross-platform development frameworks (e.g., Flutter, React Native).
  • Knowledge of Android Jetpack components and libraries.
  • Familiarity with cloud services (e.g., Firebase, AWS) for app development.
  • Understanding of mobile security best practices.
  • Contributions to open-source Android projects or active participation in the Android developer community.
  • Benefit from invaluable mentorship provided by seasoned leaders.
  • Enjoy a vibrant atmosphere enriched with engaging games and activities.
  • Receive quarterly rewards as a token of recognition for your valuable contributions.
  • Immerse yourself in a creative and open culture that fosters innovation.
  • Full-time / Freelance / Part-time / Contract
  • A minimum duration of 6 months is mandatory.
  • In case of no prior experience, you have the option to apply for an internship.
    • Ready to embark on an exciting journey?
    Submit your CV to join our team and dive into a rewarding career of innovation and growth!
    RGB Webtech stands as a well-regarded software development company situated in Chandigarh City, India. As a pioneering and inventive IT enterprise, we proudly identify as a startup. Our spectrum of services encompasses comprehensive solutions in the realms of web design, web development, digital marketing, and mobile app development, spanning across various platforms. Our commitment extends to delivering enhanced services and adept solutions to our esteemed clientele, effectively addressing their requirements and facilitating the realization of their objectives.

title: Subject Matter Expert
jobDescription:
• Act as technical expert on R&S , datacenter networking and Wireless technologies
  • Perform analysis and diagnosis of complex networking and security problems
  • Deploy and support multi-vendor network & security solutions
  • Deploy and support network and security monitoring & management tools
  • Prepare/update HLD & LLD , process and technical documentation
  • Support on Sev 1 incidents to resove within SLA
  • Perform RCA based on OEM inputs
  • Provide improvement opportunities and recommendations on network and security
  • Perform tool evaluation and produce recommendations. Support new project opportunities and efforts estimation.
  • Work with Global IT support groups, OEMs, vendors, partners and service providers
  • Provide training to operations team (L1/L2)
  • Learn and keep up-to-date with the latest technology products
  • Key SPOC for Transition, transformation, Organic growth, GREEN/BROWN field projects.

about you
Experience
  • 12-15 plus years of related experience in routing-switching & wireless, datacenter networking and security.
  • Implementation and operational experience with enterprise on Multi vendor OEM s (Cisco,Arubaetc)
  • Experience with RF technologies, Security,AVC on Wireless Front.
  • Experience in network security technologies like Cisco ISE, ACLs, VPN, L2VPN, L3VPN, IPSEC, GRE etc.
  • Experience in datacenter networking like BGP-Lite, VLAN, VxLAN, FCoE, TRILL, OTV, IS-IS etc.
  • Experience of working with Visualization technologies ( VMware, Hyper-v etc.) and virtual network
  • Experience of datacenter consolidation, transformation and migration projects
  • Knowledge and experience on cloud computing infrastructure and orchestration
  • Knowledge of Software Defined Networks and Network Function Virtualization technologies

title: Senior Software Engineer - Observability & AIOPS Solutions
tagsAndSkills: VMware,Root cause analysis,GCP,Analytical,Machine learning,ITSM,IT infrastructure,Incident management
jobDescription:
• Design, implement, and maintain AIOps solutions to monitor and analyze IT systems, applications, and networks.
  • Deploy machine learning algorithms for anomaly detection, root cause analysis, and incident prediction.
  • Configure and manage observability tools and platforms to gain real-time visibility into system health and performance.
  • Develop monitoring dashboards, alerts, and reports to provide comprehensive insights into the IT environment.
  • Conduct root cause analysis for incidents using data from AIOps and observability tools to identify underlying issues.
  • Work closely with software engineers to instrument applications with appropriate logging, metrics, and tracing capabilities
  • Continuously analyze monitoring data to identify trends, anomalies, and opportunities for optimization.
  • Stay updated with industry trends and advancements in AIOps and observability practices, and recommend new tools or methodologies for adoption

about you
  • Overall 10+ years industry experience out which 6+ years in Monitoring tools and 2-3 years of experience working with AIOPs / Observability tools and machine learning frameworks
  • Strong knowledge of IT infrastructure, networks, servers, databases, and cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP, VMWare and / or Kubernetes).
  • Proficiency in Python or Java
  • Understanding of IT service management and incident management frameworks.
  • Experience in designing monitoring strategies for microservices and cloud-based applications.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Good to have experience working with Data Stream processing systems like Apache Kafka & Data Visualizatio using Grafana
